expo.name: CoronaMap
expo.description: An app that shows a map of users who self-reportedly have COVID-19 or show some of its symptoms.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CoronaMap requires access to your location in order to anonymously display it in clusters on the map, depending on your well-being status.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: CoronaMap requires access to your location in order to anonymously display it in clusters on the map, depending on your well-being status.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: CoronaMap requires access to your location in order to anonymously display it in clusters on the map, depending on your well-being status.
